page.title: 08Children's Days
page.content: if I get stuck I go out to Mr.Barrett and he helps me. It is quite long to playtime and when it comes I am glad to play with my friends.(J.M.) Playtime is 10:25 and we usually play "Walley" against the mobile. At 10:40 we come back in to do{ Maths}up to lunchtime. In Maths Mr.Barrett who's our teacher does Maths with us {Fractions}and{Decimals.}(M.H.) At{dinner time}we wash our hands and go into the hall. We boys have to set out the plates and knives forks and spoons. I am on sandwiches.My mum is a {dinner lady.}So is Mrs.Hadley.There are 2 sides,one for dinners and one for sandwiches.At 12.30 we go out for playtime.We play 'Walley'or football or rounders or baseball or hide and seek or 'Spot'.(I.S.)
